actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the reasonable cause exception from the penalty for failures to file tax returns or pay taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the failure to file returns or to pay taxes shall be treated as due to reasonable cause and not due to willful neglect under specified circumstances.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the reasonable cause exception from the penalty for failures to file tax returns or pay taxes.
